text: E jenumanja wankulupilile! Pati n'jesile petala lya Allah (kukupuuta ngondo) basi lolechesyani (nkanintende chilichose), soni ngasim'becheta kwa mundu jwampele salamu (yanti): “Nganim'ba wakulupilila mmwejo,” (ni kum'bulaga). Nkusachilila ichindu yakumala ya umi wa duniya! Nambotu kwa Allah ni kwaili yakupata yejinji. Mmomopemo ni mwamwawelele wanganyammwe kalakala, basi Allah niwantendele ukoto (pakun'jinjisya mu Usilamu), basi lolechesyani. Chisimu Allah abali syosope sya yankutenda awele Jwaasimanya chenene
